Body:
I am working on UWP app, while deploying coming error : DEP6701 : Bootstrapping failed with unexpected error: 'DEP6960 : Source file does not exist: C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Phone Tools\14.0\Debugger\target\armv4i\msvsmon.exe'

I am using Visual studio 2015, Raspberry pi 3, Windows 10 core installed in Raspberry pi.
Are you using Windows 10 PC to deploy?

If you can't find msvsmon.exe in the path C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Phone Tools\14.0\Debugger\target\armv4i\" try to [install](https://www.visualstudio.com/downloads/#remote-tools-for-visual-studio-2015-update-3) it."
I have installed Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2015 Update 3". Then restarted PC. .. still same error. msvsmon.exe doesn't exist."
No, I am using Windows 7 to deploy.

It seems related compatibility issues.

Visual Studio 2015(Enterprise, Professional, Community) is supported Build only" on Windows 7 for UWP development.

You can check Visual Studio 2015 Platform Targeting and Compatibility.

"
